text: Luteolejeunea is a genus of liverwort in family Lejeuneaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Luteolejeunea herzogii, (Buchloch) Piippo == References == Category:Porellales genera Category:Lejeuneaceae Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Luteolejeunea
